source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is an aerial scenery shot of a lush, green mountain peak surrounded by a sea of thick, white clouds. The camera slowly moves forward, flying along the misty ridgeline. In the distance, other mountain peaks are visible poking through the cloud layer under an overcast sky.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is an aerial scenery shot of a lush, green mountain peak surrounded by a sea of thick, white clouds. The camera slowly moves forward, flying along the misty ridgeline. In the distance, other mountain peaks are visible poking through the cloud layer under an overcast sky.

generated_critique: The caption accurately describes the camera's movement but omits the motion of the clouds, which are swirling around the mountain. The introductory phrase "This is an aerial scenery shot of" is redundant and can be removed for conciseness. Additionally, the adjective "lush" is subjective. The description should be more direct, integrating the scene's elements with the observed movements.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: An aerial view glides along the misty ridgeline of a densely forested mountain as thick, white clouds swirl around its peak. In the distance, other mountaintops emerge from the cloud layer under an overcast sky.
